about.details:
Incorporated in 2013, Gujarat based Axita Cotton Limited is a company engaged in the manufacturing & export of cotton bales & cotton seeds. The company also does ginning and pressing of Kapas on a job work basis. It is a TUF (Technical upgradation fund ) Approved by Textile ministry of India- Govt. of. India).

The company's production facility is located at Kadi in Mahesana District of Gujarat state. It has installed 48 Ginning and Pressing machines with a capacity of processing 87,600 MTof seed cotton annually.

From 2016-17, Axita Cotton commenced exporting its products directly to Bangladesh, Pakistan, and Vietnam. During 2016, the promoters of the company floated a new company named, Axita Exports Private Limited ("AEPL"), a group company, with the aim to export cotton bales to various countries. AEPL exports cotton bales purchased from the company. It also purchases and exports cotton bales from other suppliers.

The company's revenue from operations reached to Rs 12327.02 Lakhs in 2017-18 from Rs 1736.08 Lakhs in 2013-14.

Axita Cotton has 23 permamnent employees in various departments.

faqs.question: What is the Axita Cotton IPO?
faqs.answer:
Axita Cotton IPO is a SME IPO of 1752000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹10.51 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹60 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on December 27, 2018, and closes on January 2, 2019.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Axita Cotton IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Axita Cotton IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Axita Cotton IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Axita Cotton IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Axita Cotton IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Axita Cotton IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Axita Cotton IPO opens on December 27, 2018 and closes on January 2, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Axita Cotton IPO?
faqs.answer: Axita Cotton IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Axita Cotton IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Axita Cotton IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Axita Cotton IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Axita Cotton IPO will be done on Monday, January 7, 2019, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, January 9, 2019. Check the Axita Cotton IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Axita Cotton IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Axita Cotton IPO listing date is on Thursday, January 10, 2019.
